licence_overview:
If you want to use a raised structure in Scotland (eg platform or stage) to provide seating or standing accommodation, you need approval from your local authority.

Conditions may be attached including the maximum number of people permitted on the structure.

Application fees are payable.
licence_short_description: Approval from your local authority to use a raised structure to provide seating or standing accommodation in Scotland.
overview: You need approval from your local authority to use a raised structure to provide seating or standing accommodation in Scotland
title: Raised structure approval (Scotland)
